onboarding-card-tip1.message: Welcome to FreshTab! We've started you off with some of your favorite sites.

onboarding-card-tip2.message: Missing one of your favorites? Check out the 'plus' button.

onboarding-card-tip3.message: Add your favorite news site (e.g. spiegel.de) for some special functionality.

onboarding-card-tip4.message: Did you know you can drag the cards to rearrange them?

onboarding-card-tip5.message: See what else the Plus button has to offer... try adding a widget!

onboarding-card-tip6.message: Thanks! We hope you enjoy FreshTab. Hover over the top right corner and click to close.

not_supported_card.message: This card is no longer supported and can be removed.
